EmailTemplate.description: Salesforce Unavilability Notice for myStrength Data migration
EmailTemplate.name: Salesforce Unavailability Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: Salesforce Sales Cloud - Maintenance Notice (12 PM - 4 PM CST on 3/21/2020, Saturday)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Salesforce Sales Cloud - Maintenance Broadcast
Salesforce Team will be deploying enhancements (Groot release) to our Salesforce Sales Cloud on Wednesday, January15th from 4.30 PM CST through 9.30 PM CST.
Salesforce may not work as expected during this time which may result in data loss and corruption. Please plan accordingly. You will be notified as soon as the system is fully functional and ready to use.
Questions? Send message to crmrequest@livongo.com
